items.sentence: I thought Tom would be the next one to do that.
I wish Tom wouldn't do that by himself anymore.
I wasn't the one who showed Tom how to do that.
I warned you what would happen if Tom did that.
I wanted to do that yesterday morning with Tom.
I tried to convince Tom not to do that anymore.
I told Tom it was dangerous for him to do that.
I told Tom I thought it would be OK to do that.
I thought you were going to ask Tom to do that.
Tom has never kicked a soccer ball in his life.
Tom waited for someone else to do that for him.
Tom waited until someone else did that for him.
The problem is that we don't have enough water.
I'd like to thank you once more for everything.
Check the tools and see if anything is missing.
Look in the rear-view mirror before backing up.
I don't want to live in my own country anymore.
No matter how rich you are, you can't buy love.
I don't have any brothers, but I have a sister.
When I grow up, I want to be a train conductor.
